<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html b:css='false' b:defaultwidgetversion='2' b:js='true' b:layoutsVersion='3' b:responsive='true' b:templateUrl='indie.xml' b:templateVersion='2.5' expr:dir='data:blog.languageDirection' expr:lang='data:blog.locale' expr:xml:lang='data:blog.locale' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' xmlns:b='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/b' xmlns:data='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/data' xmlns:expr='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/expr'> <head> <b:comment>DNS Prefetch Blogger</b:comment> <link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//1.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//2.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//3.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//4.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//blogger.googleusercontent.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//lh5.googleusercontent.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//www.blogger.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <b:comment>DNS Prefetch All</b:comment> <link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//fonts.gstatic.com' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//fonts.gstatic.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <b:comment>TITLE</b:comment> <b:if cond='data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isSearch and !data:view.isLabelSearch and !data:blog.searchQuery)'> <title><data:view.title.escaped/></title> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <b:elseif cond='data:view.isSingleItem or data:view.isSearch or data:view.isArchive'/> <title><data:blog.pageName/> - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <b:elseif cond='data:view.isError'/> <title>Page Not Found - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <b:else/> <title><data:view.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> </b:if> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/>
<b:comment>THUMBNAIL</b:comment> <b:if cond='data:view.featuredImage'> <meta expr:content='data:view.featuredImage' property='og:image'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.featuredImage' name='twitter:image'/> <b:elseif cond='data:blog.postImageUrl'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.postImageUrl' property='og:image'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.postImageUrl' name='twitter:image'/> <b:else/> <meta content='https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjT35oWJvwPT5lAM8cIkvk3-KEsTAkeAsyCOusz9guckOLeCVcvXTSZaBUjw0c4v0VMqSKqw72SqpnYuhfds-pC7x6F57Soq84JyOC64_5PBJAVjCrVyDIfvvWH4HlkACFdW5Car4ZSITyssyt5IT6AuswZx5tpE-BuTrLJrXyf_jx72iN7XBxlfz98qS_S/s1600/ito.png' property='og:image'/> <meta content='https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjT35oWJvwPT5lAM8cIkvk3-KEsTAkeAsyCOusz9guckOLeCVcvXTSZaBUjw0c4v0VMqSKqw72SqpnYuhfds-pC7x6F57Soq84JyOC64_5PBJAVjCrVyDIfvvWH4HlkACFdW5Car4ZSITyssyt5IT6AuswZx5tpE-BuTrLJrXyf_jx72iN7XBxlfz98qS_S/s1600/ito.png' name='twitter:image'/> </b:if>
<b:comment>DESCRIPTION</b:comment> <b:if cond='data:blog.metaDescription'> <meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' name='description'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' property='og:description'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' name='twitter:description'/> <b:else/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='description'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:description'/> <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:description'/> </b:if>
<b:comment>KEYWORD</b:comment> <meta content='Manga, Manhwa, Manhua browsing Template' name='keywords'/> <meta content='Manga, Manhwa, Manhua browsing Template' property='article:tag'/>

category.term: Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor

entry.title: Chapter 12

category.term: Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor

entry.title: Chapter 11
Chronicles Of Heavenly Demon (Cooming Soon)
entry.content:
Discovering the Charm of DragaManga: A Haven for Romance Manhua Lovers

For those who find joy in the vibrant world of manhua, especially the romance genre, DragaManga has become a beloved destination. This platform offers an extensive array of manhua series, each filled with unique stories, breathtaking art, and unforgettable characters. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the genre, here's why DragaManga should be your go-to source for romance manhua.

A Curated Collection of Engaging Stories

One of the standout features of DragaManga is its carefully curated selection of romance manhua. Here are some highlights that have captivated readers:

1. "Our Secret Marriage":

- Synopsis: Choi Yoonseol is a third-year business student who agrees to a marriage to fulfill her grandfather's dying wish. Her unexpected journey into married life is filled with heartwarming moments and plenty of humor.

- Genres: Drama, Romance, Shoujo.

- Why Read It: This story beautifully combines the innocence of first love with the complexities of fulfilling family duties, making it a heartfelt read.

2. "Silver Lining":

- Synopsis: This manhua follows Gaby, a mute girl bullied by her former best friend, Sam. Her life takes a positive turn when Vicky steps in to protect her, leading to a touching romance.

- Genres: Romance, Drama.

- Why Read It: The narrative of overcoming adversity and finding love through kindness and resilience is incredibly moving and relatable.

3. "Love, How Do You Do That":

- Synopsis: Bestselling thriller author Lee Siwon switches to writing romance novels to understand love better. He proposes a relationship with his friend, Sodam, leading to unexpected emotional growth.

- Genres: Romance, Drama.

- Why Read It: This story offers a unique perspective on exploring love and relationships, making it a fresh and intriguing read.

4. "Not Just a Secretary":

- Synopsis: Sein, a dedicated secretary, impulsively spends a night with her boss, Director Shin Taehun, which alters their professional and personal dynamics.

- Genres: Romance, Josei.

- Why Read It: The complex relationship and power dynamics explored in this manhua add depth to the romance, making it an engaging and thought-provoking series.

5. "I Proposed To The Pope":

- Synopsis: Reborn Princess Helene decides to change her fate and protect her empire from turmoil. Her interactions with the Pope and the protagonist from the book add layers of intrigue and romance.

- Genres: Romance, Fantasy.

- Why Read It: The mix of political intrigue and romance makes this manhua a compelling and exciting read.

User-Friendly Experience

DragaManga isn't just about great content; it's designed to be user-friendly and engaging. Here’s what makes the experience special:

- Easy Navigation: The platform's layout allows users to find and access their favorite manhua effortlessly.

- Regular Updates: With frequent updates, readers can stay engaged with their favorite series and never miss a new chapter.

- Community Feel: DragaManga fosters a sense of community, encouraging readers to discuss their favorite series and share recommendations.

Conclusion

DragaManga is more than just a site; it's a vibrant community for romance manhua enthusiasts. Whether you're into heartwarming love stories, intense romantic dramas, or fantastical tales with romantic twists, DragaManga has something for everyone. Dive into the world of romance manhua and explore these captivating stories on [DragaManga](https://DragaManga).

By offering a blend of quality content and a welcoming user experience, DragaManga continues to be a cherished destination for manhua readers worldwide. So, if you’re looking to lose yourself in the magic of romance manhua, DragaManga is the place to be.

entry.title: Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor
entry.content:
"An emperor who died unjustly becomes a wretched bastard son!" Ian, a wizard of the Bariel Empire, became emperor at a young age, but was imprisoned due to his nephew's rebellion. However, he was saved by the wizard Naum using forbidden space-time magic. This magic leads Emperor Ian 100 years into the past, where he possesses Bastard Ian, the illegitimate son of the Margrave family that went extinct 100 years ago. Bastard Ian is about to be taken hostage by the barbarians! Ian is about to get caught up in a bloody conspiracy!!!

Ki Joonsuk 2024

link.title: Margrave’s Bastard Son was The Emperor

entry.title: Academy's Genius Swordmaster
entry.content:
The game becomes reality, the rules of the world are subverted and human beings enter the era of job changes for all. Only by becoming a Job Changer! And becoming stronger! Can one stand on top of the world! On the day of his job change, Lin Moyu became the only hidden profession, the Necromancer. From then on, since his summons will never die, Lin Moyu will also never die. “I sit high above on a throne of bones, threading the path between life and death.” “I am the Catastrophe!”

2023

entry.title: Chapter 23
Killer Pietro
entry.content:
An old killer got betrayed but somehow rejuvenated. However... no one recognizes him anymore?! "Then I'm the strongest again!"

kim junghyun 2024

entry.title: Chapter 1
The Nebula's Civilization
entry.content:
[By the studio that brought you Academy’s Genius Swordmaster!] Choi Sungwoon successfully completed all of the achievements in the game, “Perished World,” as the No. 1 player in the game’s rankings. After a brief moment of joy due to his achievement, Sungwoon receives a suspicious email and is summoned to a real version of “Perished World,” starting his race to becoming a “god”.

Beomgwon 2024

entry.title: Chapter 99
Chapter 98
Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
entry.content:
At the dawn of a revolution in the era of martial arts, hordes of terrifying monsters start invading the world, defeating humanity’s warriors one after another. One day, Lu Sheng finds himself dreaming about the world ten thousand years into the future, where even basic physical training techniques have been modified and become several thousand times more effective! Breathing techniques, body strengthening remedies, martial arts scriptures, and so on… But with humanity being extinct in the future world, these once great martial arts have no one left to carry on their legacy. No one, except for Lu Sheng!

2023
